attributes.action: Independent Police Task Force to be setup to investigate, pursue and prosecute child-sex groomers
attributes.additional_details:
The Home Office should oversee the immediate setting up of a Police Task Force to investigate existing and current cases of Child-sex grooming and rape as identified by The Times newspaper and to pursue and prosecute the perpetrators.

The Task Force should consist of the best detectives and officers from multiple forces including taking officers from Terrorist Teams if necessary.

This should take priority over any Public Inquiry to ensure this is brought to a halt.
